Control Name: 5.12.4 Lines of responsibility and designated responsible parties were clearly defined for specific functions in Azure.
Control Statement: Clearly documenting and sharing the contacts responsible for each of these functions will create consistency and facilitate communication. Examples of such contact groups include network security, network management, server endpoint security, incident response, policy management, identity...

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.12 What security controls do you have in place for access to Azure infrastructure?
